entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain ending this evening then cloudy and 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
